acceptance-test-run.title: Find products with the closest distance
acceptance-test-run.name: Find products with the closest distance

test-step.description: Given a list of products : {Whopper Meal Medium, Paket Geprek Bensu, Paket McSpicy Smokey BBQ Medium}
When the distances between the product and the customer in the same order are : {0.4, 1.9, 0.8} in kilometers
Then I should be told about the products in order : {Whopper Meal Medium, Paket McSpicy Smokey BBQ Medium, Paket Geprek Bensu}
